Key Match Events: Zach LaVine and Coby White combined for 66 points
Chicago outscored the Knicks 41-17 in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Karl-Anthony Towns took 13 shots in the game against Oklahoma City
Jalen Brunson had an outstanding performance in the game against the Bulls
Towns and Brunson's combination should have been enough to secure a win against Chicago
Five players from the Bulls scored in double figures
The Knicks' lack of depth proved to be a significant obstacle
The Knicks’ victories over the Bucks and Nuggets have been the highlights of the season
The Knicks’ inability to compete with the league’s top teams raises doubts among the media and fans about whether New York is truly a championship contender
Karl-Anthony Towns took charge in the final moments but his efforts ultimately fell short
The Knicks face the Orlando Magic next, and it’s reasonable to be concerned that the Knicks might lose three consecutive games
